Articles.Content: Hi there, I\'ve been playing for a week so on and off, and only just got round to registering. You have custom pc to thank for me finding this highly entertaining program, now I just need to see how many times I can get Jeb to panic when it all goes green,blue,green,blue,green.

Welcome to the forums fellow UKer!

Have fun and may the number of your landings be close enough to that of your take offs!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
